posting_body: Pricing subject to change without notice, contact us today.

This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1076 Sq.
Experience true balanced living through a combination of modern architecture and the serene views of the beautiful Pacific Northwest!

Located just outside of Seattle, and minutes away from I-405 and the Landing in Renton, Harrington Square is pet-friendly and offers studio, one, and two bedroom homes with large open floor plans flaunting exquisite finishes and detail including granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances.
Find your sanctuary relaxing in your home, gathering with good friends, shopping nearby retail, and dining at the neighborhood's finest restaurants and cafes.
At Harrington Square rediscover luxury and service.
- On Bus Line & Near Renton Transit Center
Our homes accommodate two pets per home.
Additional deposits and breed restrictions may apply.
Please contact our leasing professionals for more details.
Combined income amount of Gross monthly income must be at least 2.5x the monthly rent
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
